answers.author: Jill Silverboard
answers.text:
The City of Clearwater engaged Matrix Management for efficiency reviews of both our Police and Fire/Rescue Departments with favorable results.  We did not implement all Matrix recommendations, but the reviews provided a basis for organizational efficiency improvements.
